mapper.select: select prtdtntra num_transaccion, prtdtnpre num_prestamo, (case when prtdtmrcb = 0 then 'P' when prtdtmrcb = 9 then 'R' end) estado_transaccion, prtdtftra fecha_transaccion ,prtdtcmon moneda, sum(prtdtimpp)*-1 monto, max(prtdthora) hora_transaccion from prtdt where prtdtntra = (select max(prtdtntra) from prtdt where prtdtnpre = #{param1} and prtdtftra = to_date(#{param2},'%d/%m/%Y') ) group by 1,2,3,4,5

select prtdtntra num_transaccion, prtdtnpre num_prestamo, (case when prtdtmrcb = 0 then 'P' when prtdtmrcb = 9 then 'R' end) estado_transaccion, prtdtftra fecha_transaccion ,prtdtcmon moneda, sum(prtdtimpp)*-1 monto, max(prtdthora) hora_transaccion from prtdt, prhtr where prtdtntra = prhtrntra and prhtrcvia = 61 and prtdtftra between to_date(#{param1},'%d/%m/%Y') and to_date(#{param2},'%d/%m/%Y') group by 1,2,3,4,5
